p: The outbreak of ZIKV in Brazil in 2015 was one of most uncontrollable epidemics that the world has experienced. Since then, ZIKV has become a flavivirus of great medical concern. Nonetheless, to date, despite significant efforts to develop effective vaccines, no effective treatment for this emerging pathogen has been found. Therefore, identifying broad-spectrum antiviral drugs and effective clinical compounds is critical for the treatment of ZIKV patients and for the control of ZIKV outbreaks [ 25, 26].
